# lib-server-kit
***(v0.0.15)***



Getting Started
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Install via NPM:
```bash
npm install @liquicode/lib-server-kit
```

Include the library in your source code:
```javascript
const Lib = require( '@liquicode/lib-server-kit' );
```


Simple Usage
---------------------------------------------------------------------

```javascript
const LIB_SERVER_KIT = require( '@liquicode/lib-server-kit' );

```

---------------------------------------------------------------------
